texts.en: Marisol is 36 years old, single, and she lives in alone in a house she rents. She has been selling beauty products for the past 7 years. Her sales method is to take orders from her clients that choose products from catalogues that Marisol displays. When the products arrive she distributes to the clients who requested them. She has a display case where she displays the various products in stock that way clients have an option on choosing and there are more advantages to gain. She needs a loan to purchase products to have in supply and when they are on sale to immediately offer then at a better price. She will secure more income this way. This is her 4th loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and she feels that participating in a group loan has been one of the best decisions she has made with regards to the development of her business. She feels very thankful and she will once again begin this work with the group of her communal bank. She gives her word to keep on being on time with her payments. With the loan that she requests she will invest in the purchase of beauty products on sale in the next campaign.

loans.use: to purchase beauty products for resale.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos es un joven trabajador  de 24 años de edad, es soltero y vive en casa de su madre en la zona urbana marginal del distrito de Mórrope - Lambayeque. El lugar es una comunidad pequeña con aproximadamente 100  familias.

Santos tiene muchos deseos de independizarse y desde hace 4 años mantiene su trabajo de confección de gorras. Santos realiza este trabajo a la perfección pues su hermano mayor se lo enseñó hace varios años. Santos tiene muy buen acabado en sus gorras y por eso cuenta con clientes que están más que satisfechos con sus productos.

Santos desea invertir en la compra de materiales para la confección de sus gorras (telas, hilos y agujas) así como, en el mantenimiento de su maquinaria. Este es el motivo por el que solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 2000 nuevos soles que le serán de gran utilidad en su negocio.

Santos,  es un cliente antiguo para nuestra institución y cuenta con buen record de pagos.
texts.en:
Santos es un joven trabajador  de 24 años de edad, es soltero y vive en casa de su madre en la zona urbana marginal del distrito de Mórrope - Lambayeque. El lugar es una comunidad pequeña con aproximadamente 100  familias.

Santos tiene muchos deseos de independizarse y desde hace 4 años mantiene su trabajo de confección de gorras. Santos realiza este trabajo a la perfección pues su hermano mayor se lo enseñó hace varios años. Santos tiene muy buen acabado en sus gorras y por eso cuenta con clientes que están más que satisfechos con sus productos.

Santos desea invertir en la compra de materiales para la confección de sus gorras (telas, hilos y agujas) así como, en el mantenimiento de su maquinaria. Este es el motivo por el que solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 2000 nuevos soles que le serán de gran utilidad en su negocio.

Santos,  es un cliente antiguo para nuestra institución y cuenta con buen record de pagos.

loans.use: Comprar telas,hilos,agujas y arreglar maquinaria.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy thread, lace & a sewing machine for sewing business.

loans.name: Leonie

texts.en:
Leonie is married and is a mother of a ten-month-old baby. She is 27 years old. She sells second-hand clothes and she has done this business for the past six years. Her business is going on well and she is proud of that. 

Her business enables her to meet the needs of her family and buy a piece of land on which she plans to build a house. She is requesting  a loan to buy more second-hand clothes in order to make more profits. She plans to reinvest all the profits she hopes to make.

loans.use: to buy used clothing.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
Antonio tiene 42 años, es divorciado, se encarga de la manutención de la casa y de sus tres hijos quienes asisten a diversos centros educativos.Hace más de seis años que se inicio en el ramo de venta de electrodomésticos.
Don Antonio se dedica a la venta de una gran gama de electrodomésticos en lo cual le va muy bien, pues esta situado en un muy buen lugar al costado de la ruta principal por donde el cual concurre mucha gente. Cuenta con clientela formada debido al tiempo que lleva en esto.
Se define a si mismo como una persona muy humilde y admirada por el muy buen trato que le da a sus clientes.
Solicita el credito para la compra de electrodomésticos, para que así pueda atraer a mas clientes. Tiene mucha fe en el credito porque le sera de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
Antonio is 42 years old and divorced.  He is responsible for supporting his household and his three children who are attending different schools.  More than six years ago, he started selling electrical appliances.

Antonio sells a wide range of electrical appliances and business is doing very well as it is situated in a very good location beside the main road where many people pass by.  He has regular customers owing to the length of time he has been in the business.

Antonio defines himself as a very humble person who is admired for the way he treats his customers.

Antonio is requesting a loan to buy electrical appliances, so that he can attract more customers.  He has a lot of faith in the loan because it will be very helpful to him.

loans.use: to buy electrical appliances to stock his business

loans.name: 3 De Junio Group

texts.es:
El Comité 3 de Junio de la ciudad de Villa Elisa cuenta con 15 integrantes, están en el tercer ciclo. Se reúnen en forma semanal en la casa de la secretaria , momento en el cual comparten ideas a realizar para las actividades así como también para resolver las posibles desavenencias. Todas las integrantes del grupo se muestran solidarias y con ganas de salir adelante.
La señora Adela ella vive en su humilde casita con su marido e hijos y tiene su pequeña despensa que quiere ir agrandando a través de los ciclos. Ella desea salir siempre adelante con sus microemprendimientos y sacar adelante también a su familia. Comenta que todo el sacrificio que hace es por un futuro mejor para sus hijos.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de comestibles, bebidas, hortalizas y demás para el abastecimiento del local. Esta con las esperanzas puestas en el crédito, ya que sabe que le será de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
The “Comite 3 de Junio” (June 3rd Committee) from Villa Elisa city has 15 members and they are in their 3rd loan cycle. They meet weekly in the secretary's house, where they share ideas for activities to carry out, as well as to resolve any possible disagreements. All the members of the group demonstrate solidarity and the desire to move ahead.

Mrs. Adela lives in a humble little house with her husband and children and she has a small store that she wants to continue growing through the loan cycles. She wants to advance always with her micro-enterprise and to advance her family as well. She comments that all of the sacrifices she makes are for a better future for her children.

Adela is requesting a loan to buy groceries, drinks, garden vegetables, and other items to resupply her store. She has her hopes placed on the loan, since she knows that it will be a great help.

loans.use: buy groceries, drinks, garden vegetables,and other store supplies.

loans.name: Ryskul's Group

texts.en:
Ryskul is the leader of this group. She is 53 and married to a security guard. Together with her husband she takes care of two grandchildren, both of whom study at school. In order to earn additional money for the family budget, Ryskul’s husband also works in construction. 

Three years ago, with an initial investment of 5000 soms, Rysku started to breed livestock and then resell it after fattening. She applied for the loan because she needs additional funds to increase the number of livestock. She wants to purchase six farm animals for breeding, fattening and further reselling. 

--- Where Did This Loan Come From? ---

This loan is brought to you by Mol Bulak Finance (MBF), a young, ambitious and socially-focused Microfinance Institution in Kyrgyzstan. 

MBF is strongly committed to the principles of sustainable development and upholds the triple bottom line – People (building human capital and taking care of its customers as well as society), Planet (keeping environmentally friendly) and Profit (earning revenue to expand autonomously). MBF is the only Microfinance Institute in Kyrgyzstan that delivers its services to customers 365 days a year. To learn more about MBF and view a Video presentation about the organization, please visit: http://www.kiva.org/about/aboutPartner?id=135 

If you would like to support and learn more about Kyrgyzstan and microfinance in Central Asia, please join our Lending Team - Supporters of Kyrgyzstan – Mol Bulak Finance at http://kiva.org/team/kyrgyzstan. Members will get special updates and news from Kiva Fellows in Kyrgyzstan and from the MBF staff.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Dep

texts.en:
Dep is a 56-year-old married woman living in Ho Chi Minh city. Dep has 4 children. Dep’s husband works as a driver.

Dep earns an income to support her family by operating a beauty salon together with a general store in the front of her house. She has done this for 4 years. She plans to use this loan to buy a greater variety of basic goods to stock her store.
  
She hopes that this will enable her to increase the turnover of her business, earn a higher income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety and quantity of basic goods to stock her general store.

loans.name: Juma

texts.en:
Juma is a married man with five children. Three of his children attend school, while two have already graduated from school. He owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

For the past year, he has operated a charcoal-selling business, selling to his neighbors. He faces a major business challenge of seasonality, especially during the rainy season. He dreams of securing larger loans in order to expand his business in the future.

With the 10,000 KES loan he is requesting, he would like to purchase additional sacks of charcoal for re-sale purposes. He decided to join Yehu so that he could have greater access to loans to boost his business.

loans.use: To purchase additional sacks of charcoal for re-sale purposes.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is 48 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 6 children. 

Virginia provides a motorela or habal-habal services with her husband as the driver. She has had this business for 6 years. She requested a loan of PHP 12,000 to buy tools and pay for the gasoline for maintenance.

Virginia has been a member of HSPFI since 2008. In the future, Virginia hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy tools and pay for the gasoline for maintenance

loans.name: Glicerio

texts.en:
Glicerio is a 32-year-old married man with 3 children aged 11, 4 and 1. He is a farmer and has been growing rice for 4 years. Glicerio sells his harvest at the market and earns about 5000 PHP per month.

Glicerio has requested this loan to purchase fertilizers and other farm inputs. He hopes to achieve an abundant harvest. He also hopes to save for his children's education.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and other farm inputs

loans.name: Cherilyn

texts.en:
Cherilyn is 39 years old and lives in Sepac, Sapang Dalaga. She is married with five children. 
To earn a living, Cherilyn has a business selling snacks and other delicacies. She earns about PHP 2500 each month doing this type of work. Cherilyn has  requested a loan of 20,000 to purchase fertilizer for her corn.
Cherilyn has been a member of PMPC for 4 years.

loans.use: To purchase 10 sacks of fertilizer for her corn

loans.name: Percy

texts.es: El socio Percy está solicitando otro préstamo para mejorar los equipos médicos de su consultorio. El anterior crédito al socio Percy le ayudo a comprar más equipos médicos y así pudo brindar una mejorar atención a sus clientes, él obtuvo buenas ganancias de la cuales lo destino para la alimentación y para los gastos del hogar. El socio Percy está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos.
texts.en: Percy requests another loan to improve the medical equipment of his clinic. The previous loan requested by Percy helped him to purchase more medical equipment. He was then able to provide his clients with a better level care. He obtained good profits which he used towards the nutrition of his family and to cover the household expenses. Percy is happy for this loan and he is committed to making his loan payments.

loans.use: to purchase medical equipment.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan G. de 39 años se dedica a la comercialización de flores naturales, como rosas, jazmines, gladiolos, claveles etc. Inicialmente esta actividad la realizó en el negocio de un primo, y cuando estuvo preparado para atender él solo el mercado se independizó y ahora genera sus ingresos independientes, desde hace 10 años. Él se encuentra ubicado muy cerca al parque cementerio y sus principales clientes son los familiares de difuntos que se acercan a llevar flores a las tumbas de sus seres amados. En la actividad de venta de flores las fechas de mayor repunte de sus ventas son los fines de semanas y festivos, los días de los difuntos principalmente. Su sueño es convertirse en mayorista de flores pues conoce el mercado de los vendedores al detalle. En la actualidad está aplicando a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará al por mayor y de contado flores para dar inicio a la meta que se propone.
texts.en: Juan G. is 39 years old and sells flowers like roses, jasmine, gladiolus, carnations, etc. In the beginning, he ran this business with his cousin. When he was ready to work at the market on his own, he became independent, and now he has been making his own money for 10 years. He is located close to the cemetery, and his main clients are families of the deceased who come to lay flowers on the graves of their loved ones. In the business of selling flowers, the days of the greatest sales spikes are weekends and festivals, days honoring the deceased mainly. His dream is to become a flower wholesaler since he knows the retail market. Right now he has applied for a Kiva loan, first financing through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. With this he will buy bulk flowers in order to begin going after his goal.

loans.use: to buy bulk flowers such as roses, gladiolus, carnations, etc

loans.name: Venancio

texts.en:
Venancio is 62, married and has seven adult children. He is a farmer who raised his family in a village. For almost 44 years, he has owned and managed a rice-farming and hog-raising business; he earns an income of approximately PHP 12,000 per month. Most of his income goes toward their daily consumption and the allowances of his grandchildren. Despite the hardships of life, he has aimed to improve his business because he wants to give his children a better life. Through his patience and hard work, most of his children have finished their studies and they are now professionals. Despite this, he wants to continue managing the business because he wants to earn and save for their future.

He is asking for a loan of PHP 40,000 to buy feed, vitamins and vaccines for his hog-raising business. He mentioned that the loan will help him to make an improvement in his piggery and increase the number of his pigs. He believes that "if there is patience, there is progress." This is his principle in life.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and vaccines for his hog-raising business.

loans.name: Rolando Filimon

texts.es:
El señor Rolando tiene 35 años de edad y es soltero.

Rolando tiene 10 años de dedicarse a prestar sus servios como jornal. Él aprendió este oficio por la necesidad de ayudar a sus padres, ya que ellos son de escasos recursos económicos. Antes realizaba actividades agrícolas y fueron sus padres quienes le enseñaron, ya que era una costumbre de familia.

Rolando solicita el préstamo para comprar dos vacas, de esta manera podrá ayudar más a sus padres, ya que tendrá la leche y la guajada para el sustento diario. También como derivado de la leche tendría el suero, para engordar unos terneros. Así ira ahorrando para pagar el crédito y para casarse.

El crédito contribuirá en gran medida a que la vida de Rolando y sus padres mejore, ya que él dice que ayudara mucho en su economía, ya que él planea casarse y construir su propia casa, y tener todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
Rolando is 35 years old and he is single.

For 10 years, Rolando has been working a day laborer. He learned the trade out of the need to help his parents, who have limited financial resources. He used to work in farming before and it was his parents who taught him, as it was a family tradition.

Rolando is requesting the loan to buy two cows. In this way, he will be able to help his parents more, as he will have the milk and the curd for daily sustenance. Also, as a milk derivative he will have the whey, with which to fatten some calves. That way he will be saving to pay for the loan and get married.

The loan will contribute in great measure to improve Rolando and his parents’ lives. He says it will help their financial situation a lot, as he plans to get married and build his own home and have everything that is necessary.

loans.use: to buy two cows.

loans.name: Teofilo

texts.es:
El socio es el Sr. Teofilo; el socio tiene  56 años de edad; el socio tiene 3 hijos, el socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de jardin,el es propietario de un jardin que junto con su esposa administran,el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 2:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio el socio saca adelnate a sus hijos,el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el jardin . El socio solicita el préstamo para implementar el jardin y comprar papeles,libros,colores y pinturas al por mayor.

El socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Teofilo is 56 years old and has three children.  He and his wife run a kindergarten and work from 8:00 am to 2:00 pm.  They move their children ahead in life through this business.  He wants to expand and improve the kindergarten and is asking for this loan to buy paper, books, crayons, and paints in quantity.

He appreciates the support he’s getting and promises to be disciplined about making his payments.

loans.use: to buy school supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase stock of retail products such as sugar, flour, etc.

loans.name: Beatrice Gbedonudé

texts.fr: Mariée et mère de quatre enfants, la cliente commercialise un peu de tout que se soit le savon les bougies,le lait en poudre et les pates alimentaires depuis 15 ans . Dans le but d'élagir,de satisfaire sa clientèle et de rentabiliser son activité, elle sollicite et obtient un prêt à Finadev. Le revenu issu de ce prêt l'aidera à couvrir partiellement les charges de son foyer et à ouvrir sa boutique à domicile.
texts.en:
This borrower is married with four children. For the past 15 years, she has been selling a variety of products including soap, candles, powdered milk, and pasta, among others. 

In order to increase and satisfy her customer base, and to make her business profitable, she is seeking a loan from Finadev. She will use the income earned with the help of this loan to offset part of her household expenses and to open a shop in her home

loans.use: to buy several cartons of soap, candles, milk, etc. for resale.

loans.name: Gloria Patricia

texts.es: La joven Gloria Patricia es empleada de una empresa que produce joyas y accesorios para dama, a la par tiene propio un taller pequeño que comenzó hace unos meses con algunos ahorros propios. A sus 20 años es una emprendedora quien desea incrementar la producción y atender la demanda de su taller, para lo cual necesita de la compra de insumos y una nueva maquina con lo cual puede cumplir su objetivo. A futuro sueña con tener un taller muy grande y generar muchos empleos.
texts.en: The young Gloria Patricia is an employee at a factory that produces toys and women’s accessories. She has her own small workshop that she opened a couple of month ago with some of her own savings. At 20 years old she is an entrepreneur who wishes to increase production and meet demand. To do that she needs to buy raw materials and a new machine so that she can reach her goal. For the future she dreams of having a much larger workshop and of generating many jobs.

loans.use: to buy raw materials and a machine for her workshop making and selling jewelry.

loans.name: Israel

texts.en: Israel is 42 years old. He is married to a farmer with nine children. All of them go to school. He sells different items such as soap, salt and cooking oil, a business which he has been running for the past 10 years. He has requested the loan to buy more similar items to add to the same business inventory. With the profits, he will pay school fees for the children.

loans.use: To buy more soap, salt and cooking oil.

loans.name: Genevieve

texts.en: Genevieve is married and has three children. She is 32 years old and lives in Dolipos Alto, Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. To earn a living, Genevieve has a hog fattening business. She has had this business for three years. Each month, she earns approximately 3,000 PHP. She has requested a loan to purchase more feeds for her pigs. Genevieve has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Genevieve hopes to have more savings.

loans.use: to purchase more feeds for her pigs
